snippet: A Federal Appeals Court has revived a decade-old insider-trading case brought against Nelson Obus, a New York hedge fund manager, by the Securities and Exchange Commission.
abstract: A Federal Appeals Court has revived a decade-old insider-trading case brought against Nelson Obus, a New York hedge fund manager, by the Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline.main: Appeals Court Revives Insider Trading Case Against Obus
headline.print_headline: A Decade-Old Insider Trading Case Is Revived
